content: The three pillars of our strategy are: first, maintaining our leadership position in smartphone audio by delivering world class products and outstanding execution to the leading customers in the market; second, expanding the reach of our audio components and technologies in key profitable applications beyond smartphones; and third, leveraging our world class mixed signal engineering expertise to build a growing footprint of products outside of audio in what we call our high performance mixed signal product lines. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open. Your line is open.
